Apparently in one of the first monero purchases (circa june 2014) someone bought a painting for 2500 monero.  Thats worth a little over $900,000 right now.  I hope the artist kept that #XMR!

Monero (XMR) is an amazing cryptocurrency that I highly recommend looking into.  However there is a hard fork this month that will create "MoneroV" and it looks like MoneroV will be at best a scam and at worst compromise the security of your Monero transactions.  Be careful!
